Creator and developer of the app
I chose to do it for free. Can you offer me a coffee?, if you donate, I will remove the adds on your app, just send me and email!!!

This is an Open Source app.

To download SlimFacebook you have to:
 - Open https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.bluecarrot.lite 
 - Login in Google (if you aren't already logged)
 - Push "Become a tester"
 - Open this with the Play Store App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.bluecarrot.lite
Opening browser you can download or share this image.
